title: Global Knowledge-Sharing Practice Community Course Using MOOCs

context.prior_knowledge: Experience utilizing online learning platforms and demonstrated leadership capabilities
context.additional_context: Corporate manager/leader training enhancing global knowledge-sharing competencies via MOOCs and developing field-applicable solutions through communities of practice.

learning_goals: Learners can design and implement strategies for building communities of practice (CoP) on MOOCs platforms
Learners can complete a project proposing an open learning ecosystem within an organization through knowledge-sharing barrier analysis
Learners can operate global knowledge-sharing workshops using collaboration tools in a BYOD environment
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
